3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: All boys are Drunk and Dreaming about their Dream Girl "Prisha". Finally after argument they decides among them selves to propose Prisha, one by one - What next only Fun...:)

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Guys decided among them self to propose Prisha one by one. 1st Attempt taken by Devadatta and 2nd Attempt done by Ronny. These two guys tried to impress Prisha by their own way and tried to propose her.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Continued from EP-4.. After Devadatta and Ronny, Now its Suresh and Rahul's Turn to propose Prisha in their owned way. What happen Next? Just click and watch -Have Fun and Enjoyyy.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Guys having picnic fun and suddenly come to know that their luggage thrown out due to non payment of the rent - What happen next..Just Click and watch.. Entry of New girls can be fun.. :)

imdb.plot outline: "Pyaari-Yaari" is lite mood comedy web series telling story of 4 bachelor friends who are sharing the accommodation and living together happily. The story revolves around the Girl who has shifted into the same building as a Neighbour. Her Hotness, Friendliness and Smart attitude are qualities any man would want her to be the Girl Friend/Life Partner to possess. Four different boys from different backgrounds and characteristics eventually fall in love with the girl. What follows next is a laugh riot, in the way the four eligible bachelors try to get themselves acquainted and eventually impress the girl and they propose the girl individually and come to know that she is already committed in long term relationship. The story takes a sudden turn when a new entry of another Girl that happens to create confusion between all guys. This Web Series will go through various emotional graphs where the four boys will have their individual shares of gains and losses vis-a-vis their competitors. At the end they all will become closest friends of each-other and become the most happening and unbreakable group of Friends.
imdb.title: Pyaari-Yaari
plot: "_Pyaari-Yaari_ (qv)" is lite mood comedy web series telling story of 4 bachelor friends who are sharing the accommodation and living together happily. The story revolves around the Girl who has shifted into the same building as a Neighbour. Her Hotness, Friendliness and Smart attitude are qualities any man would want her to be the Girl Friend/Life Partner to possess. Four different boys from different backgrounds and characteristics eventually fall in love with the girl. What follows next is a laugh riot, in the way the four eligible bachelors try to get themselves acquainted and eventually impress the girl and they propose the girl individually and come to know that she is already committed in long term relationship. The story takes a sudden turn when a new entry of another Girl that happens to create confusion between all guys. This Web Series will go through various emotional graphs where the four boys will have their individual shares of gains and losses vis-a-vis their competitors. At the end they all will become closest friends of each-other and become the most happening and unbreakable group of Friends.::Amey Ramesh Parulekar

Its all about Friendship.. Four friends are sharing deep bond and their casual attitude will creates lite mood comedy and make to feel easiness on screen. Its dialogues oriented comedy web series will show joy of friendliness and importance of Friendship.::Amey Ramesh Parulekar
